Package org.wise.portal.presentation.web.controllers

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccessDeniedController  
    CheckForExistingAccountController  
    CompatibilityCheckController
    Controller for Compatibility Check page
    ContactWiseController  
    ControllerUtil
    A utility class for use by all controllers
    CredentialManager
    The Credential Manager is responsible for creating unique credentials for HttpRequests, and authenticating credentials from Servlets those credentials were forwarded to.
    DiscourseSSOController
    Handles Single Sign-On (SSO) from Discourse, an open source discussion form
    IndexController
    Controller for WISE main index page
    InformationController
    Handles requests for User information and VLE config
    LoginController
    Controller that backs the Log-In form, for when user fails to log in.
    OutsideErrorController  
    PreviewProjectController
    Controller for previewing a specific project Parameters can be projectId and runId
    ProjectMetadataController  
    RouterController  
    StatisticsController
    Controller for handling WISE statistics page
    TaggerController
    Controller to add/remove tags from projects
    VLEController
    Controller for handling student VLE-portal interactions.
